Title: Relates to the confinement of companion animals in vehicles in extreme temperatures
Summary: Relates to the confinement of companion animals in vehicles in extreme temperatures; provides such animals may be rescued if certain conditions are met.
LawCode: Amd ยง353-d, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to the confinement of companion animals in vehicles in extreme temperatures
